actions.text: Reported to Senate from the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs (without written report).

actions.committee: Senate Committee on Rules and Administration
actions.text: Referred to Senate Committee on Rules and Administration.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Rules and Administration with amendment, S. Rept. 93-145.

official_title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for routine purposes.

summary.text: Authorizes the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs to expend from the contingent fund of the Senate, during the Ninety-third Congress, $20,000 in addition to the amount, and for the same purpose, specified in the Legislative Reorganization Act of 1946.

titles.title: A resolution authorizing additional expenditures by the Committee on Interior and Insular Affairs for routine purposes.
